title: Gravity
lyrics: Gravity is working against me And gravity wants to bring me down Oh I'll never know what makes this man With all the love that his heart can stand Dream of ways to throw it all away Gravity is working against me And gravity wants to bring me down Oh twice as much aint twice as good And can't sustain like a one half could It's wanting more, That's gonna send me to my knees Oh twice as much aint twice as good And can't sustain like a one half could It's wanting more, That's gonna send me to my knees Oh gravity, stay the hell away from me Oh gravity has taken better men than me Just keep me where the light is Just keep me where the light is Just keep me where the light is Come on keep me where the light is Come on keep me where the light is Come on keep me where, keep me where the light is
